lead_paragraph: The move was part of a broader effort by the federal government to reduce deaths from drug overdoses, now more numerous than car crashes in the United States.

headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Toughens Warning on Painkiller-Sedative Mix
headline.main: F.D.A. Orders Stronger Warning on Common Painkiller-Sedative Mix

snippet: The move was part of a broader effort by the federal government to reduce deaths from drug overdoses, now more numerous than car crashes in the United States....
abstract: Food and Drug Administration says it will require its toughest warning labels to warn patients against taking opioid painkillers together with benzodiazepines like Xanax.
